SELECT rn, FINISHEDGOODS_ID, FINISHEDGOODS_NAME, FINISHEDGOODS_QUANTITY, FINISHEDGOODS_PRICE, QUANTITY_UNITS, FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(FINISHEDGOODS SYS_C0012608)*/ rownum rn, FINISHEDGOODS_ID, FINISHEDGOODS_NAME, FINISHEDGOODS_QUANTITY, FINISHEDGOODS_PRICE, QUANTITY_UNITS, FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS FROM FINISHEDGOODS WHERE FINISHEDGOODS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{goods.finishedgoods_name}||'%'
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=0
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=1
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=2
AND rownum <= #{paging.pageNum}*#{paging.pageSize}) WHERE rn > (#{paging.pageNum}-1)*#{paging.pageSize}

AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=0

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FINISHEDGOODS f WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RECIPE r WHERE f.RECIPE_ID =r.RECIPE_ID)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FINISHEDGOODS(FINISHEDGOODS_ID,FINISHEDGOODS_NAME,QUANTITY_UNITS, RECIPE_ID) VALUES (finishedgoods_seq.nextval,(SELECT RECIPE_NAME FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPE.RECIPE_ID = #{recipe_id}),'1kg', #{recipe_id})
mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE_ID FROM RECIPE r WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FINISHEDGOODS f WHERE r.RECIPE_ID=f.RECIPE_ID)
SELECT FINISHEDGOODS_ID FROM FINISHEDGOODS GROUP BY FINISHEDGOODS_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE FINISHEDGOODS g SET FINISHEDGOODS_QUANTITY =(SELECT NVL((SUM(FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_QUANTITY)-NVL((SELECT SUM(FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_QUANTITY) AS min FROM FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY m WHERE m.FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_DIVISION = '출고' AND m.FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_GOODS_ID = p.FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_GOODS_ID GROUP BY FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_GOODS_ID ),0)),0) AS FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_QUANTITY FROM FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY p WHERE p.FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_DIVISION = '입고' AND p.FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_GOODS_ID = #{finishedgoods_id} GROUP BY FINISHEDGOODSINVENTORY_GOODS_ID) WHERE g.FINISHEDGOODS_ID =#{finishedgoods_id}
